name: Gol da Alemanha Simulator
description:
A simulation game of receiving goals from Germany.

Keyboard: ASDW to move, Arrow keys to kick the ball
Gamepad: Left analog stick to move, Right analog stick to kick the ball.

Sorry, despite the english description the game is only in portuguese :(

The game was made in 24 hours as a joke after the Brazil X Germany Match where germany scored 7 goals against Brazil. The game was made by me (Daniel) with music, narration and SFX by Thiago Adamo.

You can found the awesome Soundtrack made by Thiago Adamo for this game here: https://soundcloud.com/pxldj/goal-theme-gol-da-ale...
